reviewText: No sugar, no GMO garbage, no fillers that come with store bought extracts. This stuff is just amazing. I use it in everything from baking to cooking and even as suggested in my coffee which is saying a lot because I normally do not care for flavored coffee! You cannot go wrong with this. I've ordered from this merchant before, customer satisfaction is their priority and service was quick, shipped right out with tracking even! I'll be buying from GLS Goods again! I won't use any other vanilla!

This is my absolute, undisputed favorite tea right now. I love Darjeeling, but I'm not wildly fond of the lighter, first flush ones for being too delicate. This Darjeeling, especially when steeped a while, has a good tannic bite. It's bright and warm all at the same time, and pretty much explodes with that classic 'Darjeeling' flavor. It's not even remotely delicate, but neither is it hard-edged. It's sort of like good-looking men in bespoke suits -- strong but refined. I use boiling water, steep for 4-5 minutes, and with a large mug use one Splenda and just a tiny splash of milk. Then get out of my way, because with this tea, I can take on the world!

I ordered spongbob slippers and I got John Cena not too happy ... my son was looking forward to them being spongebob!! ..  there very thin :(((( ps if I wanted john cena I would have ordered that ... zero stars

reviewText: My wife picked some of this up on sale.  I usually drink Crystal Light so she though this would be a decent alternative. The taste isn't the greatest. If all you are looking for is a caffeine fix then this would work. But the cough syrup flavor wasn't my favorite.
summary: Tastes a Bit  like Cough Syrup

reviewText: I bought these on sale (2 for $4) at my local supermarket, so at $3 these are probably overpriced.  The price is decent when comparing to MIO, however.  The flavor I bought was actually cherry limeade, which tastes similar to the Great Value powder by the same description and the taste is the same.  As far as "fantasy fruit", web reviews say it has a pretty indistinct fruit flavor but it tastes good.I can't comment much on the caffeine content since I'm fairly immune to caffeine at this point.  However, if you're stepping down from caffeinated diet cola to flavored water, as I am, you're probably going to want something like this to ease the transition.  This fits the bill well.My main gripe has to do with value.  I assumed, since this was billed as "24 servings" that it would actually flavor 24 x 16.9-ounce bottles of water - but they must be referring to a different amount of water because at that rate, you would NOT be able to taste much of anything besides water.  At best, you might get 10-12 uses out of a bottle if you want actual flavor.Compare that to Great Value powder, which sells for $2 per 10-pack.  Both are similar in price but I find that the powder can flavor two bottles of water.  The liquid enhancer requires a large amount to get any actual flavor.  Since there is no precise measurement, it is hard to tell when you've used too little or too much.The one advantage liquid flavoring has over powder is that it doesn't fly everywhere in a stiff breeze.  When you get the red powder on your clothes (or anything porous), it is very difficult to get out.  So if you're camping or running a fan, the liquid wins.

I had a martini at a local distillery that used a bit of wormwood bitters.  I bought these wanting to recreate the drink at home.  These aren't quite the same.  They have a bit more of an anise flavor than the other bitters did.  That being said, I like them!
I bought these to be part of an Xmas gift, so I needed them to look nice.  They came through with flying colors; the recipient was impressed, especially with the light blue flecked with green dice.
And they're pretty nice! One set looks like ice, and you get a set of four thrice. Kind of overpriced.

I don't buy a lot of accessories for my games but I am very happy I purchased these dice. Not only does it fit the theme very well for my Dresden Files RPG, they look very cool and I feel actually add to the theme color scheme wise. Nice job Evil Hat Productions.
As a Dresden Files fan, i just had to get the Winter Knight themed dice. I am very pleased with their quality and the design.

Umm, OK everyone reading this review, put this item in your cart, again... Now again, and again, just keep adding more and more, you will get HOOKED just like me! I'm a HUGE chocolate lover, to be in my top 3 is a BIG deal this one made it up there! WHAT?! a new favorite?! MOST DEFINITELY, beautiful packaging and an exquisite unique taste. Gotta buy more now- ADDICTION! YUM, HEAVEN on EARTH!Absolutely, outrageously delicious!!

I use like a 1/3 of a teaspoon in a spicy cup of soup I make at times and the smoky flavor is so overwhelming that it's the only thing I end up tasting.  And mind you, this is coming from a person that really adores smoky flavors.. but really, the smokiness is just too much and makes every other flavor practically disappear from your soup/dish.

I've enjoyed many varieties of hot sauces, but I've always wanted a hot pepper powder for things like pizza, spaghetti, etc.The Ghost Chili Pepper is an outstanding chili pepper powder.  My son, who likes hot sauces too, tried it on his pizza, and put on too much.  He couldn't finish the piece he was eating, it was so powerfully hot.  So, the next piece of pizza, he very carefully placed a fine dust, and then it was perfect.  Like the label says, it's extremely hot.  But, boy, is it good. I've got to find a fine holed shaker to dispense this chili pepper.  Based on the amount I use, it should last a while.If you love hot, this chili pepper is it!
good heat  for a chilli  head,  if you think jalapenos are hot not for you.watch out if  just shaking the jar  , it will fall out in clumps . use a spoon or it will get ya
Exactly what is should be.  Tasty and hot! This will take my wings over the top, fried chicken too.  Thanks!

I grew fresh ones this summer and wanted some powder so I wouldn't run out. It is very spicy and tastes great smoked, and the smell is unique from the fresh non-smoked dried ones I have at home.I can't see this jar lasting long in my family. In the long term I will probably switch to buying bulk habanero powder since it's potent enough and can be found in large pound-plus sizes on amazon.
Fast and hot, did I mention hot, well it's hot
Added a few pinches to cheese sauce and took it to work the dip was gone in 30 mins and everyone was euphoric and mouths were burning.  I'm definitely buying more.
summary: Very spicy great to addition to other sauces

reviewText: The powder is delicious and very spicy as we expected. It has a nice smoked flavor and you only need to use a little bit since it is pretty spicy.

I haven't used this in a recipe for wings yet, but I have added to a beans and rice meal and it added a great heat!  Once I make some wings, I'll add my findings.  If it is as good as I am hoping, I'll change the review to 5 stars.
High quality! worth every penny you pay for it. The heat will not be tamed by dairy or anything else. Great Smokey taste and better than smoke dried whole ghost peppers available on web.
Yes, this stuff is hotter than hell, literally hotter than hell. If you wan to win the spiciest chili contest use a tablespoon of this. The flavor itself is not that interesting though.

A little goes a long way! It is HOT, so one jar should last quite a while if you don't go crazy (why would you with this stuff?) I do NOT regret buying this what so ever! In fact, I will definitely be buying another once my current one runs out! Those looking for intense heat, this stuff's for you!
This chili powder adds a wonderful spiciness and smokiness to dishes.  Warning, however. Ghost peppers have a spiciness that increases after the first taste, so adjust accordingly.

I should have taken the warning label more seriously. I sprinkled a teaspoon into my soup and I was in drenched in sweet on a cold winter day. This will even make Chuck Norris shed tears!  I never had anything more hotter than this Ghost chili pepper powder. You only need a pinch of this stuff and 2 ounces will last a life time.  Not only is this great for spicing up dishes, you can make hot sauce and even use it as mace.
summary: This will make Chuck Norris cry

reviewText: I was hooked on Trader Joe's ghost chili peppers and a grinder, but that product was only briefly available and seems to never be coming back to the store again. So in desperation I went looking for this product. It's a little more expensive probably however it's very finely ground, so ounce for ounce it's probably a similar price to Trader Joe's, and once I had tried ghost chili peppers in my dishes I was never going back.The bottle has been shrink-wrapped and looks to be very fresh and attractive and I would say you're getting about well as much as would fit
summary: Hot and smoky and finely powdered and quite delicious

reviewText: I made a batch of beef jerky and added half teaspoon per pound of meat.  Tastes great and heat level 7 out of 10.  I have used several peppers over the years but just learned about the ghost pepper.  It takes several seconds then bam.Warning.  I tried to taste the powder by dipping my finger in the jar and applying on tongue.  Very potent.  The jar will last quite a while.  Would recommend.  Fast shipping.

My order arrived today and I had to dip a finger in and taste it right away (yes I'm a pepper head). The flavor was very good and typical of other Jolokia powders I've had--the distinct pepper flavor with a smokey-sweet edge to it. As for the heat, it did not disappoint--it ramped up to full intensity within about 20 seconds and lasted a good long while. I will definitely be enjoying this with my meals! If you can get it at the introductory price, it's an outstanding value for 2oz and I would strongly recommend it. Even at full price, I would say it's at least as good, if not better than any other Jolokia powder I've tried and well worthy of consideration.Note: this does not have a shaker top so you might want to order a 4oz spice shaker bottle with it.Enjoy!
Wow. This stuff is hot. As expected. I truly love the smoky flavor. This jar will last a while, thus the slightly higher price is OK.
Great product 1/4 teaspoon gave a giant pot of my chilli that heat. Awesome tast little goes along way. High quality.  Fresh way worth it pluses u get 2oz others bearly give 1oz.

These taste even more wonderful than they look! I was supposed to receive by April 24th at the earliest and got on the 9th! Super fast shipping to the US. Thanks guys! These will be a wonderful addition to my wedding favors for my Dr Who themed wedding! Definitely recommend this highly!
Tasted great!

I am a Doctor Who fan who lives in the American Midwest. When I saw these they made me think of the 4th doctor, who was fond of the treat. Even though they are a far cry from local fare and had to travel half way across the world, they are good. A little like gummi bears but with a slightly different texture. It took a couple of weeks to get here, but got here sooner than they promised.

This thing is huge. I gave away half of them as a Christmas present, and it still lasted me several months. They're a bit smaller than the original, which I still prefer, but these are definitely better for the price than anything you can get on Amazon, and pretty much anything you can get in the US.
summary: Not the original, but still good.

reviewText: I miss these like crazy , so I was a happy camper to find a supplier that will ship across the pond . Love the natural flavours of these jelly babies

These are not the original but a good mini choice. My daughter is in a Doctor Who club at school and they had a party a few weeks ago and I thought these would be a great surprise for everyone. The kids loved them and the teacher asked for seconds. I am a huge WHOvian and a fan of all things sic-fi. These are not like gummy bears. They have a different texture and flavors but they were still good...

These things are tiny, maybe the size of gummy bears. Normal Jelly Babies are about the size of the average ring finger from the last knuckle to tip, but these are tiny. Normal Jelly Babies, you eat one at a time, but these you can almost eat by the handful. That surprised me a little. I thought they'd be a little smaller but they're baby Babies.However, they still have a similar texture; a bit leathery on the outside and squishy in the middle. That's what makes Jelly Babies unique. They're not rubbery like gummy bears, they're chewy on the outside and soft on the inside. And these ones by Haribo are delicious. I was surprised at how much flavor each one has.Would I buy them again? Yeah, you betcha, they're awesome! But if you're looking for a trip in the TARDIS with Tom Baker, look elsewhere. 4 stars, only because I wish they were a little bigger, but 4 stars because they're really really yummy!

It was the correct flavored product, but it was in a tiny bag.  I did convert the size from metric prior to buying it, but it was still a lot smaller than expected.  Good if you have a craving for sour starburst that you can't find anywhere else.  But it would be a bag worth $2-3 to buy at the store in the US (if they carried it!).  So the rare flavor has a cost I guess!

Now they are a reasonable price & I just ordered 5 bags with a smile on my face. Plus no crappy huge shipping fee. These are the best thing in the world & I wish they would make more of Japan's amazing amount of awesome-sounding kit-kat flavors more affordable & even just available (I've heard there have been MANY different flavors over there, something over, like 50 of them) to us here. Where I live, the closest good Japanese market is over an hour away, and they don't have the stuff I want ever anymore, so it's not worth it. Not sure which other markets in San Jose or the surrounding areas also carry the other best candies & snacks, but I wish I did. This seller has now made it so I don't have to worry much about that anymore though. I can order 5 bags & get a discount, which totally rocks my socks. Ooooh!!!  I discovered these in Japan, and have been CRAVING them ever since getting back to the states.  Notice how the label says 「オトナの甘さ」?  Folks, that means "Adult Sweetness"... the kind of sweet an adult can appreciate.  Sophisticated are the tastes of the grown-up!  You get the subtly sweet cream flavour mixed with the savory notes of green tea.  It's Nirvana in a bag, my friends.Yes, I wish these were available domsetically, and maybe some day soon, Nestle will get the message. But for now, you may have luck finding them in an Asian grocery store.  If not, order mass quantities here, and share them with your friends!

this is one of the best snack around. I believe most negative comment is about overprice for the amount. I do agree $10 for a bag is not worth it, because I bought it in local store in America for only $5. However it is very hard to find.

I have been wanting to try green tea kits for the last year or two, and finally just decided I would fork over the money (these are expensive) and give them a go! So glad I did! These INSTANTLY became my new favorite candy of all time! If you have ever had a green tea frappucinno from Starbucks, these taste very similar to those. You can taste the matcha green tea, and it is kind of creamy. These are delicious! You get 12 individually wrapped packs in this bag (each individual pack is small too. definitely smaller than American Halloween sized ones, but not by too much.) I do have to say some of my kit kats were a little melted upon arrival, but that is summertime I guess. I will DEFINITELY purchase these again very soon! I recommend them to anyone who likes kit kats and who loves green tea!
The good folks at Amazon estimated a month or so for shipping, but I received mine in two weeks. If you're a fan of green tea lattes these are right up your alley. We need these in America, STAT!

I got to really like these things when I was living in Japan and jumped at the chance to get them back here in the States. JList would sell them for a few weeks a year (they're a seasonal item in Japan, only available in summer) and would sell out quickly.I ordered two bags of these. I knew something was up before I even opened them. The plastic of the bag was crinkled in such a way as to say, "These things were in a big box with a LOT of other bags in a very hot place for a while."And certainly the candy inside bore out that conclusion. Each of them had the 'crumbly' texture of chocolate that has melted and re-solidified at least once if not multiple times. The cookies inside were crushed in most cases. And the sell-by date on the bags was about 2 weeks away when I received them.I half wonder if these are like factory seconds or retailer rejects that would never sell in Japan but which they know candy freaks like me here in the States will still buy. Well, I certainly won't do so again.
Loved the flavor of the Green Tea Kit Kat.  Heard that it was good so wanted to try it.  It came in reasonable time from Japan.

summary: They tastes alright but came melted

reviewText: This spin on the traditional chocolate Kit Kat is a welcome addition—they don't taste weird or artificial, the consistency of the wafer is just as crisp as ever, and the green-tea taste is subtle but there. Also, their light green color is pleasant! Highly recommended.
Would have given this 5 stars had it had some chocolate in it -- It is still a great little something but can you imagine how much better it would be with a smidge of chocolate???
My son loved these. Said they tasted great just like green tea. I bought them as a Xmas gift .

This flavor of KitKat is amazing and I would recommend it to anyone. It tastes very sweet and that is what I was expecting. I will be ordering more in the future guaranteed! Too bad they don't localize this flavor here in the U.S.

Tasted kind of like I expected, a less sweet white chocolate with Green Tea flavor.  I love the idea of Green Tea chocolate and I'd never seen it before.  With the shipping cost, even if it's free shipping, the cost is figured into the item, these are a little pricy and I think, not worth the money but I was happy to try them.  They did arrive a little bit banged up but just a little.
These Kit-kats are very good, but if you're looking for a strong green tea flavor- you will be disappointed. The green tea flavor is very subtle.

I found these in a Mitsuwa Marketplace in Illinois.I actually expected them to taste better than the did.  they were okay but seem smaller than standard kit kats and the taste was a tad mild compared to other green tea candies I have tried.But still, they were pleasant enough and nice for a change.
Greet taste! I love green tea! But it's a pity that green tea KitKat isn't a national brand. I will buy a lot if it does.
not too satisfied..the product is okay but the bill is too much for this small item..will not order it again
summary: another way over priced and over charged

reviewText: I got these just for the heck of it since these flavors aren't available in the USA. The package took eight days to arrive from Japan to Florida, during which there was no tracking info available. Other than that, I am glad it finally came. Each individually-wrapped mini kitkat was completely melted and required being left in the fridge before opening without literally dripping. After keeping in the fridge, if you can get over the unusual shapes it froze into, then you'll find these are absolutely delicious. Would buy again.
It is very good. I like it so much. I told my friends. They also like it. I love green tea.

My daughter watches a makeup artist on youtube named Michelle Phan that said these are her favorite candies and my daughter kept asking for them. I ordered them for Christmas. Pricey seeing as there weren't many candies in the bag, but we loved them and they were refreshing and yummy!
summary: How can candy be refreshing! LIKE THIS!!

reviewText: I love most thinks matcha or green tea... and I love kit kats.I wanted to love these, but I couldn't im sorry... I generally dislike white chocolate, and the chocolate on these is like white chocolate with matcha mixed in.it tastes somewhat chemical like and fake.  it was OKAY - edible, but don't get your hopes up... wasn't really worth the extreme price in my opinion. (about $1 for 2 mini length bars when you break it down)they did arrive in perfect condition though.
summary: pass on these... unless you like white chocolate

reviewText: I was kinda dissappointed with these. All the reviews ive read about this candy have been positive, but to me these were way too sweet. Couldnt taste the green tea at all. Maybe I was spoiled by the meiji matcha chocolate I ordered earlier. These just taste like white chocolate to me

Omg, YUMMY!!!!! These are so addictive and hard to find!!!! Worth every penny!! I sent them to my nieces and nephew as an attempt to get the coveted "favorite aunt of the year" award, I think I'm in the lead!!!
Very delicious. I had no idea what to expect. I wish I had ordered more. I really need to find a place closer to home to buy this... The shipping cost was too much.
It didn't taste too much like green tea, more like white chocolate and when it got to me it was kind of melted

These are delicious! I've been wanting to try them for awhile now and couldn't find them anywhere so ordered them a month ago on Amazon. But why has the price gone up so much?? When I ordered the same exact product from this seller less than a month ago, it was only $7.95 total! :oConsidering there are only twelve little mini kit kat bars in the bag, I'm not sure if the new price ($10.25) is worth it...For anyone concerned about the kit kat bars melting, mine did arrive a bit squishy but I put them in the freezer for just a bit and they are perfect now!
I had to try these out because I saw them mentioned on TV.  The flavor is pretty light but I didn't expect much more of something that's labeled green tea.

Creamy white chocolate infused with Matcha green tea surrounding layers of wafers. Much less sweeter than the traditional Kitkat. Small size is perfect to satisfy the chocolate craving w/o the guilt. Was in LA last week and picked up a bag on a whim at the Japanese store in Little Tokyo. Now, back in WI and regretting not picking up a handful more. Not only were these Kitkats delicious, the bags were only $5 each!

This KITKAT absolutely tastes good. As it is a special edition KITKAT, I just love them.I used to buy them from Mitsuwa but I am too lazy to drive another hour just for these kikat and I ordered them from amazon.I just got my package, guess what? ALL THE KIKAT JUST MELTED!!!! IT IS NOT A KITKAT ANYMORE BUT A MATCHA CHOCOLATE BAR!!!!all the chocolate just melted into one giant piece and it looks DISGUSTING!I will never buy them again. Id rather drive another hour for the REAL MATCHA KITKATVERY DISAPPOINTED THIS TIME!
summary: DO NOT BUY THEM IF YOU WANT A KITKAT~!

reviewText: I guess you can't expect too much from ordering candy online, but they all melted. Now it's like bits of wafer drenched in a green tea latte. Thanks.
I bought it for my girlfriend. The taste feeling of this chocolate is fancy. My girlfriend loves it very much!
The package came in good condition, although took a little too long to deliver. I bought this for my boyfriend, he loved it so much that he finished it within two days.
These kit kats are amazing. I just wish they would sell them in the US market so I don't have to pay so much for shipping.

I love foods from around the world, so on a whim I ordered these Green Tea Kit Kat Bars, they are delicious, they have the taste of a shortbread cookie that has been dunked in a hot cup of green tea!! They came from Japan in perfect condition, nothing melted, nothing broke, not a single bar out of place...I highly recommend giving them a try!!!

A creamy, good quality kit kat. Tastes mostly like white chocolate with a slight touch of green tea. I would have preferred a slightly more pronounced green tea flavor. It's a very smooth flavor and is less sweeter than traditional kit kats.I shared it with others and the response was neutral. I personally liked it.I ordered mine from SamuraiJapan with standard shipping and received the product in about 2 weeks. Fair enough. The item was well packaged and the chocolates are in excellent condition.

I was curious about these and figured, hey, what the heck.First of all, they had obviously all melted at some point. They were basically solid bars rather than kit kat bars. You couldn't separate them. That's ok though.They taste... well, exactly like kit kat. Regular ol' chocolate kit kat. Maybe it's because they melted all over the place and everything kinda mixed together, but really there was absolutely no green tea or maccha flavour whatsoever.
yummy I will find out the recepie and make green chocolate myself, its so delicious omg yummy you should try it
summary: delicious, wish they were sold in Murica

reviewText: i bought these because i never seen them in markets but after i bought them i see them EVERYWHERE for less. and i was upset but itsok. it took a while to get here too. so minus a star.
green tea kit kay?  yes please!  if you're not used to green tea, these may be a bit odd the first bite, but boy are they delicious!
These are so good if you like green tea candy. A friend brought one for me and i had to find them and buy a bag of my own. They did take a while to get to me but once they did I was very satisfied!
An original taste that really should be for sale in the states. Kit Kat needs to take a page from M&M's and sell thees as upscale versions of their product in the state. This is as good as it sounds.
These by far meet our expectations.  Best Kit Kat's EVER tasted!!!  They will rock your world :) Splurge, it's worth it!
I enjoyed this candy very much, but when I received this candy it was melting already so I had to place it in the freezer so I could enjoy better.

After hearing mixed opinions about these Kit Kats, I decided to try them. They are excellent, and I do not regret purchasing them at all. They taste like matcha with a bit of a vanilla and milky flavor as well. They are not too sweet or too plain. These are the best Kit Kats I've ever had, and I would recommend them to anyone who likes matcha-flavored candies or anyone wanting to try an unusual kind of Kit Kat.
summary: These are my favorite candies ever!

reviewText: First off, these things are delicious. Green tea and crunchy kitkat cookie makes for a wonderful experience. Not only that, but the service from this vendor is superb. I received a handwritten note with origami shuriken with my package and it made my day. I would definitely order the macha kitkats again, especially from this seller.

Very interesting and delicious! Do not, however, make the mistake of ordering chocolate in the summer. These WILL melt in transit and it's not the seller's fault. I threw mine in the freezer when I got them home and they are oddly shaped now, but still taste fine. I would like to try them un-melted, but it was my bad for thinking they'd make it across the country during the peak of summer heat.
summary: Do not order chocolate in the summer!

reviewText: I love green tea, I love Kit Kats, but the two do not belong together. I hate the after taste of them.

Green Tea Candy at first sounds nasty; however, I was surprised by the flavor. I enjoyed them so much that I finished off the whole bag. Here in Japan the cost for this bag is less than $3.00 - I totally understand the additional charges for shipping to the USA but not at these prices.

Bars melted during shipping and arrived re-solidified in lumps. When opened, they crumbled instantly and were barely edible. I don't understand why they don't package these better, especially after all the bad reviews! I should have listened to those reviews because this was just a waste of money.

Fast shipping and, oh my gosh, are these fantastic. Fresh product, no melting, and they are just... SO... GOOD. You can taste the green tea; they are sweet, but not TOO sweet. They are better than I thought they would be.
I ordered these and they did come from Japan they were okay but you have to get use to the flavor of them. But I have to admit chocolate kit-kats are better the green tea were okay though.

I ordered these in Summer so they of course arrived melted, a trip the freezer made them awesome again though. Just order them in cooler times of the year and you should get them in good condition.I love these so much more than the regular chocolate Kit-Kat bars. I hope some day to see them on store shelves in the US some day.

So i have heard that the Japanese had some interesting candy flavors out there, so i figured that i would grab a bag of these Green Tea Kit Kats, and i really don't know what to think of it. You really get a taste of the biscuit part of the bar with a slight hint of green tea. I think that if you were to give one of these to someone who didn't know the flavor, they would never guess it as being green tea. It's not bad, but nothing mind blowing either. I think everyone should try it once though.

I purchased five bags, but they only shipped me one bag, instead of the five that had been promised, AND the single bag of green tea kit kats were all melted, and crumbled from poor packaging.I contacted the seller, Santa Trading Japan to ask for my other four bags (hoping that these would not be melted or crumbled). They were very apologetic, asked "for a second chance" and promised to resend it by a faster shipping method - so I give them props for nice customer service.But I just received it today - they took the same amount of time as last time (another two and a half week days, so a month and a half total for five bags) in getting here, and were also all crumbled. I mean, if they were just completely melted I would've been fine with that so I could put them into the fridge right away and have them hardened into one singular piece, but they've arrived in little pieces! So sad.I understand that the weather conditions means that there's a risk of them being melted, but I do think that the sellers could have done something to prevent the kit kats from being smashed into small pieces, like better packaging. I can't open any of these without a bunch of crumbs spilling all over the place.
summary: Melted, only delivered one bag at first

reviewText: This candy is way to expensive for what you get. The taste is not so good. I would not recommend this to anyone.
summary: Not as good as I expected

reviewText: very delicious.hope there would be more promotional chances! i will buy it again as long as it's not too expensive

It is a must for all green tea ice-cream lovers.  I wish I could buy them in the US but  I am glad Amazon have them available from Japan.the shipping took a long time but it was totally worth the wait. plus I got some free Japanese cakes and green tea candy  as well as a citrus kitkat bar. I also ordered raspberry kitkats and love them as well. ever since a friend  let me taste these products - I got totally obsessed with them. i also recommend  KitKat - cheesecake .I will buy again ! thanks !
My daughter was very excited to find these green tea chocolates here at a decent price. She was also very excited when they came in. They are now in the frig beeing rationed out by her.

A friend at work brought these back for me when he traveled to Japan recently.  I had never seen anything like it, and am not necessarily a big fan of the American chocolate variety.  I tried one, and couldn't stop.  I ended up eating the small bag of them he brought back all in one sitting, and decided I had to order more.  I can't really describe the flavor, but all I can say is . . . "they are delicious!"  You've got to try them, especially if you are a fan of white chocolate.

The ONLY good thing about this order was the delivery time.I opened up one of the Kit Kats and got a lap full of crumbs and what was left tasted like nothing with an unpleasant stale after-taste.  I opened up another one hoping the first one was just a dud but no such luck, it was no better. All three bags where the same... tossed them all in the trash.I sent the above to Fumio Yamaoka of Come Store Japan and this was the reply:"I am sorry that the item of this time does not match your requirement".Match my requirement??? What kind of response is that??? Needless to say I'll never have anything to do with Fumio Yamaoka of Come Store Japan again.
This is now my favorite Kit Kat Flavor!  Would get this again and again if it were available here in the States.
I definitely wish they sold these in the USA!  The green tea flavor is subtle and sweet, and I would recommend them to anyone!  Just beware, they won't last long if you're not careful!

"Green tea kit kat should be available for the rest of the world", thats my opinion.This product is so delicious that you would like more from time to time, it taste great and comes in a great presentation.The only "but" is that is a little overpriced, but i undertand why they make it, it shoud be hard to get it in great quantities to the states.

I bought it for my 17 year old as she loves kit kat.We bought a mix of available flavours.This was to be the cream of the cake as it was special, but unfortunately it came somewhat crushed and the taste was nothing to write home about...
summary: Not really worth the money and wait

reviewText: extremely pleased with my purchase! Quick shipping, and they even sent an extra surprise (possibly accidentally... but I'm all smiles!) These are super delicious - matcha green tea flavor coupled perfected with the crisp crunch of the kit kat wafer.

I love these kitkats! I think theyre better than the regular ones without being too over the top. The taste is similar to green tea but its somewhat subtle and not overly sweet. These kitkats have just the right amount of everything in my opinion but I don't consider them to be perfect nor amazing.Now the subjectivity comes in the aftertaste I suppose; as both me and my youngest sister love these kitkats but my other little sister liked the initial taste but couldnt stand the aftertaste that she described as tasting likes "trees".Now I didnt have this same aftertaste nor did my youngest sister. Though these kitkats could possibly seem odd to your taste buds theyre def worth a shot. Who knows, you might find your next favorite candy like me!
I tried making something similar myself with matcha and white chocolate, but it's just not the same.  This is the second pack I've bought.

Such a great nod to green tea ice cream!  It doesn't say so on the package (as it does on the cookies and cream variety), but you can eat these straight from the freezer for a more authentic green tea ice cream experience!
summary: Delicious green tea ice cream flavor!

reviewText: Best stuffs on earth. Totally worth the wait. I love these more than any American chocolate believe it or not.

I ordered on the 6th of the month, got it on the 21st! Fast shipping.I was so excited to taste the kitkats! Mini sets of 12, packaged.It tastes like a green tea latte!! Such a unique flavor, I can't wait to buy more!!
i have to ration these things they are so good, these were not melted like previous bags were. I just wish they weren't so pricey.
Just received this in the mail. None of the individuals were squashed which is a blessing in itself. Came before the expected date which was a bonus will order from again. Plus they taste AMAZING.
The green tea flavor is very subtle and blends harmoniously with the white chocolate. I shared with several coworkers; everyone liked them!
Just got my order today.  HEAVEN IN MY MOUTH! This is one of my absolute favorite candies!  THANK YOU JAPAN!!!!
Arrived earlier than expected. Very enjoyable! Would buy again to give out to some friends that really like green tea kit kats but never have the chance to buy it.

First had these in Japan and quickly became addicted.... I love these, I just wish I could find them in a local store instead of having to order them online and have them shipped. Nestle needs to bring this flavor (and a handful of the other limited-to-Japan flavors) to the States.
summary: If you love Green Tea lattes....

reviewText: The bag was actually bigger than I expected, and they came not broken or smooshed or anything! Super delicious, and a good amount. Totally worth your money. Great shipping time from Japan to NY too! Great deal :)
Just like a kit kat, but with white chocolate green tea flavor. I'd definitely consider buying it again for a party.

Thank you so so much! I absolutely love this kit kat. I have seen many reviews about the kit kat breaking, tasting bad, and melting, I am soo sorry for those that had that happen. Every time I got the kit kat bags I received unbroken ones, but I bought them in the winter! I honestly think that the green tea kit kats probably melt during the summer? Im not sure exactly, and when I read the reviews, I felt shocked :O I wasn't sure if I should have gotten another 5 bags after I read the review. I manned up, and I said, if they turn out horrible, thats my fault to start with.
summary: <3 OMG I LOVE THIS SOOOO MUCH!!

reviewText: I was so excited to get these since I love Geen Tea. The flavor was so yummy! The only reason I am giving them 4 stars instead of 5 is because the candy bars were completely melted and crushed. I tossed them in the fridge to harden up enough to eat. Will have to order in the winter next time.
It taste like green tea graham cracker. Less sugar make you want to eat more. Wish it was a bigger bag.

These are my absolute favorite candy now....I have lived in Japan for 4 years and now I am moving.I am very HAPPY to have found them online, so I can order them any time I want! HOWEVER....You can purchase them for 238 Yen here in Japan which is roughly $2.38 USD ...Give or take depends on the yen rate.That is the only thing that upsets me a little...Other than that they are absolutely GREAT!!!!
These Kit Kats are amazing. Even my brother who doesn't like tea loves them. I wish they sold them here in the US.
summary: Japanese Kit Kat - Maccha Green Tea

reviewText: The customer service was fantastic. Highly recommend to others! They did a fine job replying to my messages and having everything solved. Great Service!

These are a great treat but too expensive. I'll get them from time to time because I like them so much (especially frozen), but not too often because of the price. They aren't too sweet and not too bitter. They are just right for my personal taste.
i love kitkat and i love green tea, perfect combination with this chocolatebeen telling friends about this and giving them samples and all of them love iti wish it is available here in the US.
I love it! I ordered package of 3 but I still feel not enough to me. So I ordered again.^.^
Nestle matcha green tea kit kat is so good there r not enough words to describe its taste and quality. You just have to try it!!!!! U will like it!!!!!
Amazing. If you love green tea and KitKats, you just can't go wrong with these. Too bad one bag doesn't last long :P
I don't know why they make this chocolate? I really don't like the flavor of it. It taste very like and chocolatey I difinitely drink the tea itself than eating this. I just waste my money.
It was basically just green colored white chocolate coating. It was good, just not what I thought it would be.

This item is unusual but yummy. Cant wait to go to Japan every year to bring them home but in between we can order these. Was sad when I ordered them (2) for a Christmas gift and only got (1) bag. :( But company fixed the error after the holidays.
summary: Great item. Our favorite. Ordered two but company only sent 1. :( But they fixed it.

reviewText: I'll never go back to the regular chocolate KitKat! Once I got these in the house we ate them all in one day.
Maccha is my favorite flavor, and the maccha kit kat tasted so good! It arrived not too long. The only problem is that it was a little bit melt when it arrive.

I like the Green Tea flavor, I am so exicted to have Kit Kat in Gree Tea flavor, however it is a little expensive for the snacks because local Nestle don't have the same product, it should ship from Japan.
These had to be made for the angels!  They are indescribably delicious!  I only wish they were bigger and available in the USA.

I received this a couple days ago as a gift from a friend who recently came back from Japan and it is so good! I only had a little box with three mini packs inside and if you eat two little bars you can't get much of the green tea taste because it is lightly flavored but the more you eat you taste the tea flavor and it is so good! America needs to be more open to trying unique candy flavors like this and not be so plain-jane because this was so good. Asked another friend to get a big bag of this because it's so expensive to purchase online, but if you love green tea TRY IT! I was doubtful of a candy that tasted of tea but gave it a shot and I'm glad because I have been missing out.

If you've got a craving for something different this is for you.  Same old Kit Kat wafer but the coating is white chocolate flavored with green tea.  Really unique.  But if you have a raging sweet tooth you probably won't like it, it's not too sweet.
The candies melted when they arrived. I could feel the heat on the box. I think at least the box should be placed somewhere cooler on the truck (if there is any cooler place on the truck).
summary: I feel like I am too stupid to purchase candy on a 90 degree day.

reviewText: I love anything Green Tea and these did not disappoint.  Only problem is they were left at my doorstep and living in Florida, the melted.

I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO EVERYONE LOVES CHOCOLATE OR MATCHA. this product is great. it;s my favorite snack, definitely. a little big expensive, but definitely worth the price!! a must try!! i've always loved Japanese food and matcha, thank you very much for your product and your special gift!! will definitely buy again!

The package arrived much sooner than expected.  If you like green tea, you will love these green tea kit kats.  So yummy and  I love them!  None of them were broken or melted. Packaged well.  I ordered a few more packs.  All smiles here.
There is no tracking number for me to track and I don't have ANY idea where the stuff is. I've been waiting for above one month.WHERE IS IT??????
Not good but this is just my preference. I cannot speak for other people.It was a little better eated coming from the fridge.
These are delicious! I have wanted to try them for a long time & I finally decided to order them. I wish I could find them locally because I could eat one every day.

I bought two of these for my boyfriend because the green tea kit kat is his favorite flavor, but before I got them (it took long time to deliver from Japan to the US for free), we broke up because he slept with someone else. So I ate all of them at the day they just arrived. They tasted soooooo good!!! No wonder why he loves this flavor! The item is as same as the description. It's a really good deal! I might buy them again in future, not for my ex, but for myself.
These arrived a lot sooner than the time frame quoted. I was nervous to try these. I shared them at work. These did not last long at all and they were ten times better than what I expected!

I tasted this at Narita Airport and they've been in my top 5 ever since. There's just no words to describe it. You can eat 100 of these and you won't get sick of it. There's a certain lightness to it. Not too sweet, not too bland. PERFECT!Oh and by the way, if you have to buy these online, I bet it's a safer bet to buy them in the cooler months to prevent melting. Don't buy them in the summer.
summary: Can't find a meth dealer? Buy this instead!!!

reviewText: A rarity to find in the U.S., the green tea kit kats are a delightful unique taste. Took awhile to deliver assuming it's shipped overseas maybe so expect a long time to get it. Maybe a month for me.

these green tea kit kats are delicious! when it was delivered on friday i didnt wake up early enough to get it so i had to pick it up from the post office on monday. before i put them in the fridge to get cold i had to try one! the chocolate was melted alittle bit to the paper but either way they were good! im gonna buy more when i get some money! thanks!

Matcha Green Tea Kit Kat tastes so good!  I find that it is not as overwhelmingly sweet as the standard chocolate version.  The sweetness is subtle and is offset by the green tea flavor.  It also pairs really well with green tea!
summary: Delicious!  Pairs well with green tea also.

reviewText: These were delicious. They came very fast considering they were straight from Japan. I would definitely order again. Let me just say, if you don't like green tea don't bother. I love green tea so not a problem here.

I had read about these online and I'd been dying to try them. I ordered these and got a big of about 15 or a 12 (I don't remember) kit kat mini sized green tea kit kats. These are really good and hard to find in most stores so I'm glad I found them.  They taste like a sweet green tea!
These were great but the macha flavor wasn't as bold as I was hoping for. They're worth trying but the strawberry is way more tasty!

The package came quite quick! I was super in love with the design of the package! And i none of them were melted like i've read other payers have gotten. They were super delicious! I am a matcha green tea lover! So i am in love with them! So delicious! I am definitely going to buy more!
Package arrived quickly & in perfect condition! loved the green tea chocolate since its not as sweet as regular Kit Kats. I will definitely be ordering again!!
Took awhile to get, but they are very tasty.  As far as I know this flavor is not typically sold where I am.

I would give 1 star, but the package came very early and i was happy about that. The problem is that they are really gross, they taste like rotten nasty fish. I almost got sick, do not buy unless you like fish chocolate!

I don't really care for regular Kit Kat bars except the white chocolate kind but these are my absolute favorite treat. thankfully these are available in the us at your local Asian supermarket. but I had no idea there were so many other flavors like passion fruit and strawberry. I love exploring all the goodies outside of the us.

I love these japanese kit kats~~!!!! but its kind of overpriced here~~ Not that I don't understand the shipping and handling costs to import the product but when i was in Japan I got a pack of kit kats (with 9; i realize this contains 12?) for around $2.10~~ sooo~~ i plan to get a whole bunch when I'm in Japan!! ^__^ But I'm still planning on ordering if/when I feel too desperate to have these :)))
These are definitely THE BEST candy bar out there!  I just wish I was able to find them in a local store instead of having to buy them online!
summary: I wish I could find these in a store instead of online!

reviewText: It is the most tasty snack I have ever had. I love it so much!I will order more for sure.

These actually taste great!  I was afraid it would taste more like white chocolate with a hint of green tea, but it really tasted like green tea!  My son bought these to share with his high school friends and they all loved them!
This product actually came earlier than expected and it was most delish!  Ate most of the Kit Kat and shared a few with friends.
Love it! I wish that they sold Kit Kat Green Tea in the stores here. If you love green tea sweets, you  try these - straight from Japan!
were great recived  fairly quick only thing  we are from Texas so the were melted but awhile in the freezer and were great will order again for stocking stuffers
Gift for coworker, I tasted and it taste like green tea. Only issue ...some of the candy was melted. This was not a problem/issue for the receiver.

Yes - this is one of the most expensive candies around, because it only comes imported. But my goodness - are these ever good. The KitKat folks could really clean up if they started selling these in the US. Once you try them you can't wait for more. So yummy and delivered quickly and fresh.

Sure, it's disappointing that I can only purchase these on-line & also disappointing that they are a 'lil pricey but they are worth every penny. Best Kit Kats hands down.  Item arrived in a timely fashion & was packaged well.  Not a broken or crushed Kit Kat.
I only wish they were easier to get in America. No food store carries them. Gotta love the Japanese. Definitely a buy.

These taste amazing. None were melted or broken. It did take about a week longer to get here than the scheduled date but the taste is worth it.I think I'll need to order more soon because I'm going to be hooked
Not only is this affordable but it is delicious and came in perfect shape!!! Will definitely order again! Wonderful just wonderful!
I love love love it! But I want more though :(It's really yummy and I probably gonna get fat haha!

A very unique take on Kit Kats. I had read about there being dozens of flavors of Kit Kats distributed in Japan and just had to try them. This flavor had the best reviews so I gave it a try. The product came a bit melted but went straight into the freezer and were fine a few minutes later.

It's a strange flavor for a candy bar, but I ended up liking them anyway. I mostly got them as care package stuffers for friends of mine, but I ended up eating one just to see what it tasted like. Then I ate two more. Now I want to try the other flavors.

LOVE this!  Very creamy with a delicate "not-too-sweet" flavor. Part of me wishes there were more in the bag...and the other part is glad there isn't. With the limited number I _have_ to regulate the treats.  If you like green tea, you will love these.

otona no amasa- taste of an adultthese kit kats are amazing and addictive. the distinct green tea/matcha flavor is very subtle but balances out with the white chocolate  and has a great flavor combined.the shipping is approximately 3 weeks but is worth it because the shipping was free and A LOT cheaper than buying a few bags at the local market
i really like green tea flavor, and this one meet my need. This snack is not too which just i like.
Most of them are meltted, I think summer is the reason. I actually planed give some the my boss, but sine the poor looking , I gave it up
It's so delicious I decided to buy a few more bags. If you enjoy green tea, you'll definitely enjoy these Green Tea KitKats! nom nom nom is all I have to say.

reviewText: I decided to try these after seeing the reddit post. I didn't even know they made these! I love matcha and these are amazing. I'm addicted already! I received them in perfect condition and two days after I ordered them! Definitely recommend them and the service from Star Japan!
it was good but when it got to me it was all melted kind of suck but i just put it in the freezer and it was all good
I'm really only ordering in hoping I get a nice note from Masakatsu and some origami shurikens. I'm sure the candy is yummy though.

I really enjoyed this tasty and unique KitKat variety! Not too sweet and with a just a hint of bitterness that reminds one of drinking tea.I wish Nestlé would bring these wonderful varieties to the United States (along with all of the other flavors such as Strawberry and Mint)

I ordered in the winter so I didn't have any melted chocolate. It has a different taste so not everyone will like it. I have to describe it as a little grainy, sweet and bitter. It sounds strange but it is definitely my favorite chocolate now.

There we were about to try a foreign incarnation of a beloved treat. The packaging was enticing. The units are all seperately packaged making it a chore to open each 2bar section. We bit into it and spit it back out. It tastes like seaweed and sardines had a Frankenstein baby in your mouth. IT WAS HORRIBLE

My dad got me some green tea Kit-Kats this past fall when he visited Japan & gave them to me for Christmas. Delicious, and I made them last as long as I could. Nowhere around here sells them, so I thought I'd order these & just pay the high price for the bag of 12 mini-size double-stick packages. These must be old or freezer-burned or something - they're just not quite the same. Not as sweet, and the texture of the green tea coating is not as smooth. This won't stop me from eating them, though - I'm fully addicted & hope that Dad goes back to Japan again soon!!!

A co-worker of mine went to Japan and brought back these Green Tea Kit Kat bars and oh my, they were AMAZING! I couldn't stop thinking about it and asked her when she was going back there to bring more home. I decided to do my search online and saw amazon sold it! The only thing I didn't like was that it costs more than any bag of candy I've ever paid for. I can look past that though because when I received the bag, none of the candies were melted and they taste just as good as the ones my friend brought home from Japan. I will be buying these again, just not online.Here on Maui there is one store that sells this amazing treat so I don't have to wait a week or 2 to taste this yummy goodness.
summary: They should sell this in the U.S.

reviewText: Well, my shipment just came in today. It took a few weeks but it finally arrived! I was pleased when I looked inside and saw my Matcha kit kats, but sadly they were melty. ;( I cannot blame this on Noriko,  since it IS the summer. A few hours in the freezer and they will be totally fine! These are absolutely delicious! Such a smooth texture, the right kind of sweet and the classic crunch of the wafer you enjoy from any kit-kat. These have to be my favorite guilty pleasure. I was also surprised that this seller included a couple of samples of her candy. What a nice gesture! I am pleased with my product, and I thank the seller for having these available so that I may enjoy a treat that is hard to come by!'''''E'''''''''''
summary: Overall I can't complain. Arigatou gozaimasu Noriko! :]

reviewText: The taste is ok but probably would have been a lot better if they had not melted at some point and were not falling apart.

reviewText: A friend recommended it to me and I bought it for the novelty.Unfortunately when it arrived the sun had melted the green tea chocolate off the candies and I had to refrigerate to make it edible.The taste was ok and apart from aesthetics there was no real damage. Second, when I got them, they had all completely melted, and because well, you know, it's made of a type of chocolate or something similar, they COMPLETELY lost their shape, and being that it's wafers surrounded by the chocolate, that ruins them. Love this coffee - it's absolutely a favorite. Strong but not bitter, and the aroma is wonderful. Definitely recommend it for coffee lovers!

Starbucks advertises this seasonal coffee as "full-bodied with complex flavors".It has four different coffees in the blend: (1) sun-dried beans from Ethiopia with a flourish of dark cherry; (2) Aged Sumatra (syrupy body & cedary spice notes); (3) juicy, herbal coffees from Papua New Guinea, and (4) Colombia (bright, balanced & nutty).(summarized from Starbucks k-cup box)The blend is described as a "intense, deeply layered coffee".Taste-wise, Tribute is a strong, medium blend (medium/bold). It has a nice underlying taste, but finishes with a bitter taste & aftertaste. So, all in all, I like the taste, but not the bitter, so Tribute is not a winner for me.  For seasonal blends, Starbucks Christmas Blend continues to be my favorite.For regular Starbucks blends, I likeStarbucks Caffe Verona, Dark, K-Cup Portion Pack for Keurig K-Cup Brewers, 96 Count, but it is a little darker than Tribute.  Outside of the Starbucks world, if you are looking for a non-bitter, smooth medium/bold(ish) blend that can be found in a warehouse store, tryNewman's Own Special Blend Coffee, K-Cup Portion Pack for Keurig K-Cup Brewers (Pack of 80).
summary: Strong Medium Blend - Hint of Bitter

reviewText: OMG Thank you so very much I didn't expect a full new order I have never been so happy to open the mail thank you again DEB

reviewText: Please Starbucks...add this flavor as a regular flavor. Was about to run out of my last box of k cups so scoured Amazon to find if any seller had. Delivery was prompt and product was the best cup of coffee you can imagine out of a K-cup, as if you walked into the Starbucks store and they ground it up in front of you!!! Fabulous smooth exquisite cup of coffee I definitely recommend.

I love this coffee. It's difficult to find in many Starbucks locations.  I found the Amazon price here for four boxes to be the best deal I could find.  It averages out to be approx. $1.60 per K-Cup.  However if you buy direct at Starbucks (In-Store) it is much cheaper ($12 for 12 K-Cups), but again finding it in stock is difficult.

reviewText: This came in a HUGE tin, much bigger than I expected.  These cookies are not sweet, so if you want something to satisfy your sweet tooth, this may not be it.  But, if you want a delicious strawberry cookie that is light and not supermarket-sweet, then try this one.  I got mine when the price was under four dollars here on Amazon.  I wouldn't pay ten dollars for this tin, though.

The wafers are thin and crisp and a friend from Europe liked them and said they were like those she gets at home.  I guess Americans are used to cookies that are really sweet.  I could go without the sweetness if there was some flavor to them.

reviewText: Nice present - for me!  Would make a great gift.  Nice big lacy silver tin with inner lid!  Tasty & sweet.  Not sickening sweet.  Good size cookies.  Maybe I'll share them?
